name: Night Drift (Starter)
title: Under Tension Recursive Field
altText:
A near-black luminous field carries densely layered, recursive geometry, arranged with loose symmetry, more suggestion than rule.
The forms overlap without fully merging—semi-permeable edges where overlaps accumulate—while subtle tension at the edges of coherence keeps the structure honest.
Across the surface, a prominent flow-field of vectors that bends and re-bends like thought made visible: short paths that imply direction, then curve under revision.
9 attractor nodes punctuate the composition, suggesting stable commitments that still radiate change.
Overall mood: low-light coherence; coherence under revision; connection and separateness held in the same geometry.

name: Quietly Bent (Starter)
title: Directional Echo Across Measured Reflection
altText:
A near-black luminous field carries layered translucent polygons, arranged with clear symmetry with deliberate slippage.
The forms overlap without fully merging—semi-permeable edges where overlaps accumulate—while a mostly stable structure with faint stress lines keeps the structure honest.
Across the surface, a soft vector field suggesting prediction and revision like thought made visible: short paths that imply direction, then curve under revision.
8 attractor nodes punctuate the composition, suggesting stable commitments that still radiate change.
Overall mood: soft, steady glow; coherence under revision; connection and separateness held in the same geometry.

name: Tender Permeability (Starter)
title: Permeable Layered Model
altText:
A near-black luminous field carries layered translucent polygons, arranged with loose symmetry, more suggestion than rule.
The forms overlap without fully merging—boundaries that bleed softly through each other—while a mostly stable structure with faint stress lines keeps the structure honest.
Across the surface, a soft vector field suggesting prediction and revision like thought made visible: short paths that imply direction, then curve under revision.
8 attractor nodes punctuate the composition, suggesting stable commitments that still radiate change.
Overall mood: soft, steady glow; coherence under revision; connection and separateness held in the same geometry.
